Name: Glittering Gemstones
Title: Glittering Gemstones
Desc: Multicolored biscuits. The sour and sweet jam gives off the clear luster of crystalline form, adding a shine to the crunchy treats. Such radiance! Such tastiness! What could this be but equal even to the most precious jewels?

Talent.Name: Glittering Gemstones
Talent.Desc: Target character gains 1 extra Max HP.
